channel.title: Help please
channel.description: im not sure if this is right place to put it but im wondering if any1 could help me start a bit of coding. Iv wanted to try for some time but i never had the time to put into it till now.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2007, 11:23:51 PM[/size][hr]can anybody teach me a few things

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @eekz eekz
item.description:
@eekz wrote:

ok ill teach you how to add commands

first for

/*END OF FRAME TESTING*/ in your client.java

then under it add this

if (command.startsWith("[b]commandname[/b]") &&[b] playerRights >= 2[/b]) {[b] addItem(775, 1); addItem(1837, 1); [/b] }

ok the things in bold are what youi need to edit

commandname change that to what you want your to be name aand what you need to type in

playerRights >= 2 ok see the number 2 well that number 2 meens that only admins can do it if you change it to 1 only mods and admins can do it if you change it to 0 every 1 can do it


addItem(775, 1);
addtem(1837, 1); ok see the numbers like 775, 1 ok the 775 is the number of the object ure gona get and the 1 is the amount your gona get of the object

Read full topic
